word: We met a good congregation at the Seventh-day Adventist church at this place. I spoke to them upon the love of Jesus. . . . Fathers and mothers brought their children, and introduced them to me, and I spoke with each one, even the least little one among them. Then we took the street car and went on our way to the vessel. . . . The brethren said as we left them, "Do give us more labor as soon as possible. . . . Do send us a preacher." . . . .
